languages.text: "Надеюсь, что все так и останется". {n}Кассия виновато склоняет голову, не решаясь поднять на вас взгляда.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Надеюсь, что все так и останется". {n}Кассия виновато склоняет голову, не решаясь поднять на вас взгляда.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I can only hope that things will stay that way." {n}Cassia lowers her head guiltily, not daring to look at you.{/n}

languages.text: “我只能祈祷你的情况不会继续恶化。”{n}卡西娅愧疚地低下头，不敢抬头看你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I can only hope that things will stay that way." {n}Cassia lowers her head guiltily, not daring to look at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我只能祈祷你的情况不会继续恶化。”{n}卡西娅愧疚地低下头，不敢抬头看你。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich kann nur hoffen, dass es so bleiben wird." {n}Cassia senkt schuldbewusst den Kopf. Sie wagt es nicht, dich anzusehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I can only hope that things will stay that way." {n}Cassia lowers her head guiltily, not daring to look at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann nur hoffen, dass es so bleiben wird." {n}Cassia senkt schuldbewusst den Kopf. Sie wagt es nicht, dich anzusehen.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Tout ce que j'espère, c'est que cela restera ainsi, » {n}répond Cassia en baissant la tête avec un air coupable, sans oser vous regarder.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I can only hope that things will stay that way." {n}Cassia lowers her head guiltily, not daring to look at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Tout ce que j'espère, c'est que cela restera ainsi, » {n}répond Cassia en baissant la tête avec un air coupable, sans oser vous regarder.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Solo puedo esperar que las cosas sigan así». {n}Cassia baja la cabeza con culpabilidad, sin atreverse a mirarte.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I can only hope that things will stay that way." {n}Cassia lowers her head guiltily, not daring to look at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Solo puedo esperar que las cosas sigan así». {n}Cassia baja la cabeza con culpabilidad, sin atreverse a mirarte.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あたくしにできるのは、物事がこの状態を保つのを願うことだけです」{n}カシアは罪の意識を感じながら頭を下げる。あなたを見る勇気はない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I can only hope that things will stay that way." {n}Cassia lowers her head guiltily, not daring to look at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あたくしにできるのは、物事がこの状態を保つのを願うことだけです」{n}カシアは罪の意識を感じながら頭を下げる。あなたを見る勇気はない。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Bir daha tekrarlanmayacağını umuyorum." {n}Sana bakmaya çekinen Cassia, suçlulukla başını öne eğiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I can only hope that things will stay that way." {n}Cassia lowers her head guiltily, not daring to look at you.{/n}
